app:6571683:Cannes:obj-090527.description: One of the more exciting aspects of Windows Phone 8.1 is the appearance of Cortana, a Siri-like voice-based personal assistant. We spent time talking to Microsoft's Marcus Ash about Cortana, and we asked him about the possibility of Cortana making its way over to other smartphone platforms like iOS and Android. After all, the demo we were given was impressive. According to Marcus, at first it'll be a focus that is part of Windows Phone, and that's the number one priority with Cortana. To extend Cortana across the entire smartphone ecosystem, that's the part that Microsoft is still mulling over…

app:6571683:Cannes:obj-0198358.author: 6571683:Yuser:7815864
app:6571683:Cannes:obj-0198358.title: Meet The Model: Jamilla @ Women Management Paris | Fashion Magazine | News. Fash
app:6571683:Cannes:obj-0198358.description:
19-year-old Dutch beauty Jamilla Hoogenboom is fresher than fresh. She quit fashion school because she found that the people kind of sucked and instead is learning on the job — the modelling job. Her friends liken her to Sid from Ice Age, and that's a compliment in our books. Get to know her below! 
Name: Jamilla Hoogenboom
Nickname: Jamil
Where are you from and where are you currently living?I'm from The Netherlands and I live in a village near to the city The Hague, which is called Wassenaar.
What were you into in high school? I really liked the art classes in high school! I love to be busy with my hands and I'm very creative.
In what ways have you changed since then? After high school I was studying Fashion Design but I didn't like the people and the school so I quit. I don't know yet which study I want to do… So I'm doing full time modelling and I'm learning a lot from this!!
What did you do for your last birthday? I didn't do any organising for my birthday because my friends organised a surprise party for me! That was really nice and sweet. :)
If you could choose to stay a certain age forever what would it be? I don't want to stay a certain age forever! Always the same thing… I want to experience every year and grow old with the one I love.
If you could have any animal as a pet, what would you choose? I think I will choose a tame little monkey! They are very smart and also cute.
What scares you most?A scary clown scares me the most.
Best piece of advice you ever received? "Don't be anything less than everything you can be."
What is a skill you wish you possessed? I would like to fly. You can go anywhere you like and you have a lot of freedom. Also the skill of being invisible seems very useful!
What fictional character to you most relate to, and why? I don't know but many of my friends compare me with Sid from Ice Age because of his goofy looks and behaviour.
What celebrity do you have a crush on? I never had a crush on a celebrity…
Which three people (dead or alive) would be your dream party guests? I don't know who I have to choose but my friends are my dream party guests for sure!!
Do you prefer crowds, small groups or being alone? Both, sometimes I want to be alone and other times I want to be among the people!
What's in rotation on your iPod at the moment? 
What do you want to be when you grow up? A proud mother of two kids living together with my boyfriend in a nice cozy house.
Can you send us a selfie? Yes!

Photography: Maxwell ClementsModel: Jamilla @ Women Management ParisAll clothes model's own.

app:6571683:Cannes:obj-0199091.description: Futebol de bolha é outro jogo que é generalizado na Europa. Indivíduos usando uma bola chamados ternos de bolso de ar empurrando um ao outro em meio a época de futebol. Inicialmente, os ternos de bolso de ar utilizados como parte de uma partida de futebol foi desenvolvida pelos canadenses em 2008. Futebol de bolha agora acabou por ser o desvio mais quente lá fora ou no interior dessas lista de nação abaixo: Itália, Áustria, Holanda, Cazaquistão, Dinamarca, Alemanha, Noruega, Canadá, EUA, Austrália, Japão, Espanha, Líbano, Suécia e assim por diante. Na bolha da Europa de futebol a partir de agora transforme-se um desvio de rivalidade mainstream.

app:6571683:Cannes:obj-0160549.title: All 147 Foo Fighters Songs, Ranked
app:6571683:Cannes:obj-0160549.description: Over the course of their two decades in the business, Foo Fighters have assumed the role of being post-grunge's Law & Order. They're not the most important or influential band, and you might not be able to tell a couple of their songs apart immediately. But they're always on, and they're always good: You change to the local rock station at any given point in the day, and you probably don't have to go more than an hour before hearing one of their hits — and when it's on, you sing along. They're the comfort food of the Alternative Nation, and an inextricable part of modern rock culture. To celebrate their 20th anniversary as a band — and this week's release of their eighth studio album Sonic Highways — we've decided to rank the 147 songs that make up the world of Foo. B-sides, live tracks, and soundtrack cuts all count, though a song had to be featured on an official commercial release to be eligible. We'll be discussing the songs in groups of about ten until we get to the top

app:6571683:Cannes:obj-0193151.description: People love to hate Simon Cowell -- for pioneering TV singing contests with The X Factor and American Idol and/or for playing the role of resident asshole on those shows -- but give the guy credit for this much: In this era of rampant individualism, he sees the enduring value of a team. We saw this principle in action when, while judging the British version the The X Factor in 2010, Cowell fashioned complete strangers Harry Styles, Zayn Malik, Niall Horan, Liam Payne, and Louis Tomlinson into this generation's reigning boy band. One Direction have accomplished way more together than they ever could have mustered apart, and although we've reached the point in the narrative when you might expect the members to split off into solo careers, they don't seem eager to break up the band anytime soon. app:6571683:Cannes:obj-0193288.description: What do you get for the man who has everything on his 50th birthday? Why, a heart-shaped private island of course.  Angelina Jolie has reportedly purchased the island of Petra, located 50 miles away from New York City, according to The Mirror. Brad, who turns the big 5-0 on December 18th, is an architecture enthusiast and specifically an avid Frank Lloyd Wright fan. So when Angie discovered Wright had designed the island's two properties, she allegedly plunked down more than $24 million dollars for Petra. UPDATE 11:33 AM PST: Well, it’s the thought that counts. Angelina Jolie has a few more weeks till Brad Pitt’s big 5-0 if she still wants to get the island of his dreams despite reports she plunked down $24 million for Petra Island just outside NYC. app:6571683:Cannes:obj-0193612.author: 6571683:Yuser:7973823
app:6571683:Cannes:obj-0193612.title: Wes Craven’s “SHOCKER” Comes to Blu-ray, Embodies Director’s Talent
app:6571683:Cannes:obj-0193612.description: It's very weird to listen to someone speak—someone you've never met—and then, a few days later, they die. Wes Craven passed away over the weekend and just a few days before, I was listening to his audio commentary for his 1989 horror film Shocker. It's just him on the track, going into how the movie was made and all the various stories and anecdotes that are obligatory for a director's commentary, and even though the track was recorded many years ago, he spoke very much the same way he always did about everything. He put himself into all of his movies, each one in its own way a reflection of what got under his own skin and kept him up at night. Shocker was made in the middle of the ten-year span between A Nightmare on Elm Street and Wes Craven's New Nightmare, a period which also gave us The Serpent and the Rainbow and The People Under the Stairs. It's like an amalgam of every idea he had all at once: dreams, ghosts, serial killers, the occult, technology overload, astral projection,

app:6571683:Cannes:obj-0179881.author: 6571683:Yuser:8272450
app:6571683:Cannes:obj-0179881.title: Chateau Alois, Belgium
app:6571683:Cannes:obj-0179881.description:
The historic Chateau Alois sleeps up to 35 guests and is the ideal place to stay with family and friends. Beautifully positioned on the banks of the River Bocq and only 3 kilometres from Ciney and a short drive from Calais and Brussels, the Chateau Alois is comprised of a main building and two wings surrounding a courtyard and has a number of large reception rooms, making it the perfect party or conference venue. Almost all of the bedrooms have en-suite bath or shower rooms.
The Chateau Alois was once home to the Bishop of Luik and dates back to the 12th century. Its ten hectares of grounds incorporate an extensive park with many century old trees. You can enjoy fishing, canoeing and swimming in its private lake and its woods are perfect for walking and cycling trips. There is also an all-weather tennis court on site.

app:6571683:Cannes:obj-0199985.title: Why Didn't Take That Take Over America?
app:6571683:Cannes:obj-0199985.description: In the late '80s, the Manchester-based manager Nigel Martin-Smith saw the success of New Kids On The Block and he had an idea: He wanted to create a British boy band of his own. He brought together 19-year-old singer Gary Barlow, 21-year-old DJ Howard Donald, 19-year-old painter-slash-dancer Jason Orange, 18-year-old football hopeful Mark Owen, and cheeky 16-year-old Robbie Williams to form Take That, a five-member band that would quickly take the U.K. -- and the rest of Europe -- by storm.

app:6571683:Cannes:obj-0200701.title: Mia 3® (Aria) 3-Speed Facial Sonic Cleanser
app:6571683:Cannes:obj-0200701.description: This product is also known as Aria.     Sonic cleansing with a harmonic blend of function and form. Sleek, modern, intuitive, Clarisonic Mia 3/Aria sings with 3 speeds, a real-time battery life indicator, USB-enabled pLink charger and a drying stand that converts to a charging station when coupled with the pLink charger.        	 		 			FEATURES 		 		 			 			3 Speeds (Delicate, Universal, Powerful) 		 		 			 			With varying levels of sonic speed, you can customize your Clarisonic Mia 3 cleansing experience to address your specific skin concerns.  			 				Designed for compromised or fragile skin, Speed 1 (Delicate) is delicate enough for even very sensitive skin conditions. 				Universal for all skin types and cleansing six times better than hands alone, Speed 2 (Universal) is developed for normal daily use and enhances cleansing by 26% compared to Speed 1. 				When an extra boost is needed to loosen and remove set-in debris, Speed 3 (Powerful) provides the power to enhance cleansing by 30% compared to Speed 2. 			 			 		 		 			 			Adjustable T-Timer 		 		 			 			For even and thorough cleansing, Clarisonic Mia 3 features a T-Timer® that beeps and pulses momentarily to indicate it is time to move to another part of your face. 			  			 		 		 			 			USB-Enabled Universal Voltage pLink Charger 		 		 			 			Perfect for the traveler, the tech-savvy Clarisonic Mia 3 has a USB-enabled p-Link® charger that makes powering up simple, at home or on the go. 			  			 		 		 			 			Interchangeable Facial Brush Heads 		 		 			 			Choose from a variety of interchangeable facial brush heads for your Clarisonic Mia 3, each uniquely designed and engineered for specific skin types or conditions. Visit our Brush Head Comparison Chart for more information. 			  			 		 		 			 			3 Year Warranty 		 		 			 			Clarisonic Mia 3 comes with a warranty covering any manufacturer defect-related problems resulting from everyday use of the product. 			 		 		 			  		 		 			 			Rechargeable  •  Waterproof  •  Made in USA 			 		 	           DEVICE COMES WITH:   Sensitive Brush Head   Sample Size Cleanser 1 oz. The patented Clarisonic Sonic Cleansing Brush uses a sonic frequency of more than 300 movements per second to deeply cleanse the skin far more effectively, yet more gently, than traditional superficial cleansing or simple rotating brushes. The result is noticeably smoother, more radiant skin.  		 		 			 			   			  			 		 		 			Clarisonic Cleansing by the Numbers 			  			Full Studies 		 		 			CLINICAL PROOF 			  			  			CONSUMER PROOF 			  		 		 			6X 			  			Better cleansing than hands alone 			  			94% 			  			Report softer skin 		 		 			  			  			  			  			  			  			  		 		 			61% 			  			Greater absorption of Vitamin C after use 			  			90% 			  			Report more radiant, glowing skin 		 		 			  			  			  			  			  			  			  		 		 			2X 			  			Daily use is proven safe and gentle 			  			  			  			  		 	          How to Use Your Clarisonic Sonic Cleansing Brush  Prior to the first use, charge the Clarisonic handle for 24 hours.
